import React from 'react' function Card(props){ const maxLenght = 247 const url = "https://media.kitsu.io/anime/poster_images/10/small.jpg?1597696803" const style = { position: "relative" , backgroundImage: "url(" + url + ")" } const moreInfo = { position:"absolute" , bottom : "4%" , left: "43.3%" } return(

{props.name}

{props.description.length > maxLenght ? props.description.slice(0, maxLenght): null}
) } export default Card
